Text: Stop, drop & roll gansuk, cause U on FIRE!!, I almost dl this yesterday, glad I waited, cheers buddy.
May main concern is can you choose a device to save your game or is it hosed like the previous upload and you have to start new each time you play?
Just downloaded and installed. This is the same version just with a different setup install. There is no way to choose the option to pick a storage device so you can't save your game.

No problems with saving here. This game both saves & loads the save files. If you are having problems with saving, the only thing I can think of, is for you to right the FGUY.exe click go to compatability, & tick the Privilege Level box to run as Admin; I didn't need to do that, but everybody has a different rig setup, but the game does save:
http://bayimg.com/oagCEAAee
Thanks gansuk A1 upload yet again, thanks. +1.

Ha ha, I've had a few beers; don't pay attention to the slip up in my last comment; right click the FGUY.exe & go to compatability, then tick the Privilege Level box to run as Admin, should do the trick.
